statement_text: Researchers warn of one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times if the highly contagious disease reaches penguin colonies.

rationale: 'highly contagious' is a technical term used before the virus name and is excluded by the technical-term guard.
statement_text: Researchers warn of one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times if the highly contagious disease reaches penguin colonies.

rationale: The phrase 'largest ecological disasters of modern times' is a superlative + negative noun.
statement_text: Researchers warn of one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times if the highly contagious disease reaches penguin colonies.
